changes.removed: "Bookmarks Toolbar" and "Tabs" get merged together when new window opened when clicking on a link
changes.added: When a window is opened with the HTML target attribute, "Bookmarks Toolbar" is hidden in the new window and the sidebar won't open in the new window (Ctrl+B/ Ctrl+H)
